Isabella Rodriguez.description: conversing about a proposed messaging feature that could enhance communication between team members @ <persona> Maria Lopez
chat: Isabella Rodriguez
Hey Maria! I noticed that you're leaving home and coming to Hobbs Cafe. I wanted to talk to you about the proposed messaging feature that Klaus and I discussed. Do you have a few minutes to chat?
Maria Lopez
Sure, Isabella! I have a few minutes to chat. Tell me more about the proposed messaging feature.
Isabella Rodriguez

I think the proposed messaging feature could greatly enhance communication between team members. I've gathered some feedback and suggestions from other team members and I wanted to discuss them with you. Are you available to meet later today?
Maria Lopez
Yes, I have some time later today. Let's meet after lunch to discuss the feedback and suggestions.
Isabella Rodriguez
Great! Let's meet at 1 PM, after lunch, to discuss the feedback and suggestions.
Maria Lopez
Should we meet in the conference room or would you prefer a different location?
Isabella Rodriguez
I think the conference room would be a good location for our meeting. It's quiet and spacious.
Maria Lopez
Sounds good. I'll see you at 1 PM in the conference room.
